author: Robert Kraychik
title: Elizabeth Hurley Goes Topless on Earth Day: ‘Illegal Wildlife Trade Have Contributed to Deadly Pandemics’
description: As various Hollywood celebrities hugged trees, supported strikes, and hyped "climate change" politics on Earth Day, actress Elizabeth Hurley stripped nude while linking "habitat destruction and the illegal wildlife trade" to "deadly pandemics."
content:
